# MySqlConnectionStringBuilder.NoBackslashEscapes property

Doesn't escape backslashes in string parameters. For use with the `NO_BACKSLASH_ESCAPES` MySQL server mode.

```csharp
public bool NoBackslashEscapes { get; set; }
```
